apps.name: Crystal Reports Viewer
description: This app allows you to view Crystal Reports within Bezlio. Key features include:
• Report data is refreshed and current automatically.
• If report requires parameters, the user will be prompted for them.
• Rendered as a PDF so viewable on all devices including smart phones.

apps.name: Company Directory

apps.name: Geocoder
description: This app allows you to geocode your customer's addresses. Key features include:
• Stores coordinates for other apps to use.

apps.name: Main View
apps.shortDescription: Monitor and perform labor transactions for all members of your team
description: This app allows a user to monitor and direct the current activities of each of the employees on their team. Key features include:
• Clock in / clock out multiple employees at once.
• Assign multiple employees to a specific task, selected from a searchable list.
• Easily add employees to a team from employee master records.

apps.name: Accounts View
apps.shortDescription: Listing of all accounts assigned to a sales rep with drill-down for details
description: This app is the primary interface the sales rep role will interact with to view / select accounts. Key features include:
• Accounts list limited to those assigned to the logged in user.
• Instant searching by account name or ID.
• Drill down to view address and contact info with click to dial, click to navigate, click to e-mail.

apps.name: Attachments View
apps.shortDescription: File attachments for the selected account
description: This app works in conjunction with Sales Rep - Accounts View and shows the file attachments associated with a given account. Key features include:
• File attachments can be loaded from either a database or network location.

apps.name: CRM Calls View
apps.shortDescription: CRM calls for the selected account
description: This app works in conjunction with Sales Rep - Accounts View and allows the user to view and add CRM calls. Key features include:
• Call history listed in a descending chronological order that is fully searchable.
• Call logs can instantly be added for a given account to be stored in the backend system.

apps.name: Customer Price List
apps.shortDescription: Price list for the selected account
description: This app works in conjunction with Sales Rep - Accounts View and allows the user to view the price list.

apps.name: Invoice Inquiry
apps.shortDescription: Invoice history for the selected account
description: This app works in conjunction with Sales Rep - Accounts View and allows the user to view invoice history with drill-down. Key features include:
• Invoices can be searched by date range.
• Invoices can be instantly sorted by any column.

apps.name: Map View
apps.shortDescription: A CRM and mapping bezl for sales reps
description: The sales rep role is currently comprised of a single Bezl that does the following:
• Allow a sales rep to see all of their assigned customers both in a grid and map view with searching.
• Reorient the map center point to any address and the customer listing will be updated to reflect appropriate distances.

apps.name: Order Inquiry
apps.shortDescription: Order history for the selected account
description: This app works in conjunction with Sales Rep - Accounts View and allows the user to view order history with drill-down. Key features include:
• Orders can be searched by date range.
• Orders can be instantly sorted by any column.

apps.name: RMA Inquiry
apps.shortDescription: RMA history for the selected account
description: This app works in conjunction with Sales Rep - Accounts View and allows the user to view RMA history with drill-down. Key features include:
• RMAs can be searched by date range.
• RMSa can be instantly sorted by any column.
